roleset.name: reaching the state of maturity

example.name: with agent
example.text: But what we didn't see was his maturity of the fundamentals.

example.name: args 1 and 3
example.text: The relationship between a parent and child is necessary to the maturity of the child into a healthy and well-adjusted adult.

example.name: args 1, 2 and 3
example.text: We witness her maturity from a scared, terrified teen to a woman understanding and accepting her fate.
example.arg: to a woman understanding and accepting her fate

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Boston Safe Deposit 's performance has been hurt this year by a mismatch in the maturities of its assets and liabilities .
